reviews.review_text: Was looking for a fish thali place in Vasco. I live in Dabolim. Google recommended this place. I drove there, placed my order. King fish thali, lepo fry, squid rava fry, paneer tikka masala. I was totally famished. Had ridden my bicycle almost 65km this morning and had skipped breakfast too. I waited and waited and waited some more. After almost what seemed an eternity( it was maybe 50-55 minutes) I got my order and off I went. Got home. Packing was perfect. Nothing had leaked or spilled. The food was‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ WOW! I polished off my plate. Was it worth the long wait? Definitely! I‚Äôd suggest calling ahead and placing the order so that you don‚Äôt have to wait.

"I had the pleasure of dining at Fodni in Goa with my family, and we thoroughly enjoyed both dinner and breakfast. The food was delicious, with authentic flavors that really stood out. The ambiance of the restaurant was warm and inviting, and the staff was attentive and friendly. Even our kids loved the meal, which made the experience even more enjoyable. Highly recommend Fodni if you're looking for a great place to eat in Goa!"

They r providing quality stuff at affordable rates . We ordered King fish thali, they have options for brown rice and  normal steam rice. Fish was fresh  and the thali gave a authentic Goan Vibe üíØ.. Everything went well but there was no washroom available in the premises that's y im rating 4‚≠ê.
